Keyboard Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact
  • Escape - Pause/Menu
  • Tab - Navigate UI

Mouse Controls

  • Left Click - Select/Activate
  • Right Click - Context Menu
  • Scroll - Navigate
